data.name: Quern - Undying Thoughts (Original Soundtrack)
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack of Quern - Undying Thoughts composed by Marcell Kerepesi - 38 tracks, 1:54:54 runtime. Format: 320kbps MP3

01 Land of Undying Thoughts
02 Missing Piece
03 Gwan Quer'nelok

05 The Island
06 First Phase
07 Delayed Thoughts
08 Blue Light
09 Sunken Memories
10 Seaside
11 Dusts and Potions
12 Flowers of Quern
13 Dulmar Remains
14 Undying Thoughts
15 Emptiness
16 Trapped
17 Scattered Memories
18 Welcome to the Mechanics
19 The Summit
20 Darkness
21 Chainless Captivity
22 Caverns of Time
23 Behind the Glass
24 Not My Concern
25 Echoes of Un'natko
26 The Seekers
27 Into the Core
28 The Library ft. Nicholas D. Yee
29 Knowledge is Power
30 Choose Wisely
31 The Gateway
32 Rising Staircase
33 The Tower
34 Echoes
35 Don't Look Away
36 Final Descent
37 The Sacrifice
38 The Follower
